name: granny rectangle blanket
sizes_available: baby, lapghan, twin & king sizes provided with instructions on how to resize chain to any size blanket!
notes:
the granny rectangle blanket is a free crochet pattern on my blog!

this rectangle granny blanket is made in 3 colors for maximum wow factor and stash busting! however, this granny rectangle blanket could be made in a solid color as well

the granny stitch rectangle is a pattern that elongates the traditional granny square to make a rectangle shape.  this pattern can be easily adjusted for size.  beginner-friendly stitches throughout - single crochet, double crochet and chain stitches.  create so many different things with this granny rectangle - various blanket sizes, scarves, cardigans, shawls, table runners, placemats and so much more!  make several rectangle grannies and sew them together for different projects.

the pattern pdf includes link to photo and video tutorial to help you with this blanket.

the pattern pdf provided is for blanket sizes with recommended foundation chains using a medium worsted weight yarn for blanket sizes:

 baby stroller: 30” x 37”
lapghan: 40” x 47”
twin: 66” x 90”
king: 90” x 114"

i also provide the formula for how to make any size rectangle!
